title: Episode 17 - Mark Flanagan
itunes:title: Episode 17 - Mark Flanagan
description: Mark Flanagan, aka “Flanny” is the founder/owner of The Largo Theater. I trade a loaf of sourdough for amazing stories about Bob Dylan, Leonard Cohen and how he created one of the best places for comedy and music on the planet.
content:encoded: Mark Flanagan, aka “Flanny” is the founder/owner of The Largo Theater. I trade a loaf of sourdough for amazing stories about Bob Dylan, Leonard Cohen and how he created one of the best places for comedy and music on the planet.
itunes:keywords: Comedy, breaking bread, Cooking, FOOD, Family, feast, bread, PODCAST, Tom Papa
